name: the r/Place exhibition
description:
On the weekend of April Fools' Day in 2017, Reddit launched a short-term social experiment called Place. After experiencing a series of disorder and order, chaos and destruction, organization, and creation, Reddit announced the end of the event 72 hours later and the pattern on the entire drawing board was finally fixed.


I was deeply shocked by this, so I moved the results of this experiment to the community, hoping to have more similar interesting things in the future. Nowadays, Figma makes it very convenient for us to collaborate on the design. We also have some interesting large-scale experiments. The link is as follows:


  1. Virtual-Figbooks ——Virtual Figbooks is for everyone who is looking for a title to read or would like to contribute by adding titles and help out the amazing community of figmates!
  2. Fig Town —— This is a virtual town mainly established by some users in China.
  3. TIE-DYE-INSPIRATION —— This is another European town.


This is the link to the original file. If there are more interesting things like this, please comment and let me know. I will update to the reference link of this file.
